A. Tricky Template æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½® $i$ æ¥çœ‹,åªè¦ $a_i == c_i \ or \ b_i == c_i$â€‹ ,é‚£ä¹ˆå°±ä¼šä½¿å…¶ä¸æˆç«‹, å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‘¢ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±éœ€è¦æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®éƒ½æˆç«‹æ‰èƒ½ä½¿å…¶ä¸æˆç«‹ï¼Œäºæ˜¯éå†åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹å³å¯
$code:$
void solve() { int n; std::cin >> n; std::string a, b, c; std::cin >> a >> b >> c; int ok = 0; for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { if(a[i] != c[i] && b[i] != c[i]) { ok = 1; } } std::cout << (ok ? "YES" : "NO") << '\n'; } B. Forming Triangles é¦–å…ˆé¢˜ç›®ç»™çš„ é•¿åº¦æ˜¯ $2^{a_i}$ ,æˆ‘ä»¬è§‚å¯Ÿä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå‘ç°èƒ½æ„æˆä¸‰è§’å½¢çš„è¾¹é•¿åªæœ‰è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µ $(2^n, 2^n, 2^k) (å…¶ä¸­ k \le n)$ ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ç›´æ¥è®¡æ•°å³å¯ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ¤ä¸€ä¸‹ $k == n$ çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è®¡ç®—è´¡çŒ®ï¼Œè®°å½• $2^n$ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºx, å°äº $2^n$ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸º $s$ï¼Œå¯¹äº $k == n: \tbinom{x}{3}$ , å¯¹äº $k < n:\tbinom{x}{2} * s$ï¼Œæ±‚ä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œç»Ÿè®¡è´¡çŒ®å³å¯
$code:$
void solve() { int n; std::cin >> n; std::map<int, int> mp; for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { int x; std::cin >> x; mp[x] ++; } o i64 ans = 0, s = 0; for(auto [x, y] : mp) { if(y >= 3) { ans += 1LL * y * (y - 1) * (y - 2) / 3 / 2; } if(y >= 2) { ans += 1LL * y * (y - 1) / 2 * s; } s += y; } std::cout << ans << '\n'; } C. Closest Cities æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ†åˆ«è®°å½•ä» $1$ èµ°åˆ° $i$ çš„ä»£ï¼Œä»¥åŠä» $n$ èµ°åˆ° $i$ çš„ä»£ä»·ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œåç¼€ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹æ¯ä¸ªè·¯å¾„çš„å–å€¼ï¼Œæœ€åæŸ¥è¯¢å°±å‡å»å³å¯
$code:$
void solve() { int n; std::cin >> n; std::vector<int> a(n); for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { std::cin >> a[i]; } std::vector<i64> pre(n), suf(n); pre[1] = 1; for(int i = 1; i < n - 1; i ++ ) { pre[i + 1] = pre[i] + (a[i + 1] - a[i] < a[i] - a[i - 1] ? 1 : a[i + 1] - a[i]); } suf[n - 2] = 1; for(int i = n - 2; i >= 1; i -- ) { suf[i - 1] = suf[i] + (a[i] - a[i - 1] < a[i + 1] - a[i] ? 1 : a[i] - a[i - 1]); } int q; std::cin >> q; while(q -- ) { int x, y; std::cin >> x >> y; x --, y --; if(x < y) { std::cout << pre[y] - pre[x] << '\n'; } else { std::cout << suf[y] - suf[x] << '\n'; } } } D. Berserk Monsters è§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªæ€ªå…½è¢«æ¶ˆç­ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå—å½±å“çš„åªæœ‰ä¸ä¹‹ç›¸é‚»çš„ä¿©ä¸ªæ€ªå…½ï¼Œå…¶ä½™çš„éƒ½ä¸ä¼šæ”¹å˜ï¼Œé“¾è¡¨æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹å³å¯ï¼Œè®¾æ¯æ¬¡åˆ é™¤çš„æ€ªå…½ä¸º$x_i$ é‚£ä¹ˆ å¤æ‚åº¦å¤§è‡´ä¸º $2(x_1 + x_2+…+x_n) = 2n$ ï¼Œç„¶åå¯ä»¥ç”¨ $set$ å»ç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œå¤šä¸€ä¸ª $log(n)$ çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œæ€»å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º $O(nlogn)$
$code:$
void solve() { int n; std::cin >> n; std::vector<int> a(n + 2), d(n + 2), l(n + 2), r(n + 2), del(n + 2); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++ ) { std::cin >> a[i]; } for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++ ) { std::cin >> d[i]; } std::queue<int> q, _q; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i ++ ) { r[i] = i + 1; l[i] = i - 1; q.push(i); } l[n + 1] = n; r[0] = 1; std::vector<int> ans; for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { std::queue<int> _q; while(!q.empty()) { int pos = q.front(); q.pop(); int v = a[l[pos]] + a[r[pos]]; if(v > d[pos]) { _q.push(pos); } } std::set<int> S; ans.push_back(_q.size()); while(!_q.empty()) { auto u = _q.front(); _q.pop(); del[u] = true; if(l[u] >= 1 && l[u] <= n) S.insert(l[u]); if(r[u] >= 1 && r[u] <= n) S.insert(r[u]); r[l[u]] = r[u]; l[r[u]] = l[u]; } for(auto x : S) { if(!del[x]) { q.push(x); } } } for(auto x : ans) { std::cout << x << ' '; } std::cout << '\n'; }

"YES" : "NO")

ç‰›å®¢å‘¨èµ›Round31 A.å°çº¢å°ç´«æ›¿æ¢ åˆ¤æ–­å³å¯
$code:$
void solve() { std::string s; std::cin >> s; std::cout << (s == "kou" ? "yukari" : s) << '\n'; } B.å°çº¢çš„å› å­æ•° çœ‹åˆ°æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´ä¸º $1e13$ï¼Œ$\sqrt{1e13} \approx 3e6$ æ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥æšä¸¾æ ¹å·ä»¥å†…çš„ç´ å› å­å³å¯
å¤æ‚åº¦ $O(\sqrt{n})$
$code:$
void solve() { i64 x; std::cin >> x; int ans = 0; for(int i = 2; i <= x / i; i ++ ) { if(x % i == 0) { while(x % i == 0) { x /= i; } ans ++; } } ans += x > 1; std::cout << ans << '\n'; } C.å°çº¢çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­å€¼ é¦–å…ˆè§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°ï¼Œä¸­å€¼å·¦å³ä¿©è¾¹çš„å­—ç¬¦æ•°é‡ä¸€å®šç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æšä¸¾$S$ä¸­æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç­‰äºè¯¢é—®å­—ç¬¦çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œç„¶åè®¡ç®—å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹èƒ½å–åˆ°å¤šå°‘å³å¯
void solve() { int n; char o; std::cin >> n >> o; std::string s; std::cin >> s; i64 ans = 0; for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { if(s[i] == o) { i64 l = i, r = n - i - 1; ans += std::min(l, r) + 1; } } std::cout << ans << '\n'; } D.å°çº¢æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œ æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé“¾è¡¨å³å¯ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ•°ç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè®°å½•å·¦å³ç›¸è¿çš„å€¼ï¼Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ“ä½œ
void solve() { int q; std::cin >> q; std::map<int, int> l, r; r[0] = -1; int siz = 0; while(q -- ) { int op, x, y; std::cin >> op; if(op == 1) { std::cin >> x >> y; r[x] = r[y]; l[x] = y; l[r[y]] = x; r[y] = x; siz ++; } else { std::cin >> x; r[l[x]] = r[x]; l[r[x]] = l[x]; siz --; } } std::cout << siz << '\n'; int now = r[0]; while(now != -1) { std::cout << now << ' '; now = r[now]; } } E.å°çº¢æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œ å› ä¸ºæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´æ¯”è¾ƒå°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½æƒ³åˆ° $dp$ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰ $dp_i$ è¡¨ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ å’Œä¸º $i$ æ—¶é€‰æ‹©çš„å…ƒç´ æ•°é‡æœ€å°ä¸ºå¤šå°‘ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªæ•°å­—æœ‰é€‰å’Œä¸é€‰ä¿©ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œè®°å½•é€‰æ‹©ä¸Šä¸€ä½é€‰å®Œçš„çŠ¶æ€ä¸º $dp$ ï¼Œå½“å‰ä½çš„çŠ¶æ€ä¸º $_dp$ ï¼Œå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€èƒ½ç”±ä¸Šä¸€ä½æ¨å‡ºï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ²¡æœ‰å½±å“ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æšä¸¾ä¸Šä¸€ä½æœ‰çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹äº $a_i$ é€‰å’Œä¸é€‰ä¿©ç§æƒ…å†µæ›´æ–° $_dp$ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯æ»šåŠ¨æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®°å½•ä½ç½®ï¼Œç”¨äºŒç»´ $dp$ ï¼ŒåŒç† $$ é€‰ï¼š_dp[i - a[pos]] = std::min(_dp[i - a[pos]], dp[i] + 1) \newline ä¸é€‰ï¼š_dp[i + a[pos]] = std::min(_dp[i + a[pos]], dp[i]); \newline æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œå¦‚æœ _dp ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å°±ç›´æ¥æ›´æ–° $$ $code:$
void solve() { int n; std::cin >> n; std::vector<int> a(n); for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { std::cin >> a[i]; } std::map<int, int> dp; dp[0] = 0; for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) { std::map<int, int> _dp; for(auto [v, y] : dp) { if(!_dp.count(v - a[i])) { _dp[v - a[i]] = y + 1; } else { _dp[v - a[i]] = std::min(_dp[v - a[i]], y + 1); } if(!_dp.count(v + a[i])) { _dp[v + a[i]] = y; } else { _dp[v + a[i]] = std::min(_dp[v + a[i]], y); } } dp = _dp; } std::cout << (dp.count(0) ? dp[0] : -1) << '\n'; } F.å°çº¢çš„è¿ç»­æ®µ $code:$
void solve() { int x, y; std::cin >> x >> y; static constexpr int P = 1e9 + 7; std::vector<i64> fac(1001), invfac(1001), inv(1001); fac[0] = invfac[0] = fac[1] = invfac[1] = inv[1] = 1; for(int i = 2; i <= 1000; i ++ ) { inv[i] = (P - P / i * inv[P % i] % P) % P; fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i % P; invfac[i] = invfac[i - 1] * inv[i] % P; } auto C = [&](i64 n, i64 m) -> i64 { if(m > n) return 0; return fac[n] * invfac[n - m] % P * invfac[m] % P; }; std::vector<i64> ans(x + y + 1); for(int i = 1; i <= x - 1; i ++ ) { ans[2 * i + 1] = (ans[2 * i + 1] + C(x - 1, i) * C(y - 1, i - 1) % P) % P; } for(int i = 0; i <= x - 1; i ++ ) { ans[2 * i + 2] = (ans[2 * i + 2] + C(x - 1, i) * C(y - 1, i) % P) % P; } for(int i = 1; i <= y - 1; i ++ ) { ans[2 * i + 1] = (ans[2 * i + 1] + C(y - 1, i) * C(x - 1, i - 1) % P) % P; } for(int i = 0; i <= x - 1; i ++ ) { ans[2 * i + 2] = (ans[2 * i + 2] + C(y - 1, i) * C(x - 1, i) % P) % P; } for(int i = 1; i <= x + y; i ++ ) { std::cout << ans[i] << '\n'; } }
